Diagram 3, Animation
The diagram depicts the process of attenuation. Two hosts are connected to a hub. H1 sends a message to H2. When the hub receives the message, it is able to read it, recreate the signal and retransmit the packet to H2. However, when H2 receives the message, it is too faint to read due to the attenuation, mainly a result of excessive cable length.
